publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 49
ab.l: Č́eb́ar avaz ḱot́uŕuv́č́uǵa ulanlarynyn Qoraḥnyn miźmor. Tynlajyz ḥanlyḥlar bunu qulaḥ salyjyz bar olturuv- čulary dunjanyn.
Daɣy adam ulanlary daɣy ulanlary kišiniń bird́ań ḥoǯa da miśkiń.

Avzum śoźlejdir uslu śoźĺar da saɣyšy juŕagimniń
aqylly śoźĺar.
Qajyrajym mašalɣa qulaɣymny ačajym qobuz byla tavur- sturmaɣymny .
Ńeǵa qorḥajym jaman vaḥtta ǵuńaḥi atlamlarymnyn qur- šasalar ḿeni.
Ol išanuvčular mallaryna da ḱop ḥoǯalyḥlary byla maḥtanadyrlar.
Qarandaš juluma julumastyr kišini b́eŕeĺḿaśtir Teń- riǵa juluv anyn üč́uń.
Da abajly bolur juluvu ǯanlarynyn da qalyr dunjada.
Da tiri bolurmo öḿurǵa dejiń ḱorḿaśmudur ǯuɣurnu.
Ki ḱoŕadir uslular öĺadirĺar bird́ań t́eli da t́eńt́ak taspoladyrlar da kemiš́adirĺar ekińčiĺarǵa mallaryn.
Źeŕat́ĺari alarnyn juv́ĺar alarɣa dunjaɣa dejiń toḥtar orunlary dordan dor- ɣa dejiń ataldylar šemĺari byla jerĺari üśt́uńa.
Da adamnyn abajly ǯany bolɣanda ičińd́a tynč qonmasa ušejdyr tuvar- lar kibik kesiĺadirĺar.
Bu jollary alarnyn telilik alarɣa da ulanlary alarnyn avuzlary byla kĺarĺar hamḿeš́a.
Qojnu ki bik ǵorǵa qojsunlar öĺum ḱut́ar alarny da erkĺanirĺar alarda t́uźĺar har ört́ań bylada da t́urśuńĺariń upratma ǵor orun qojadyr öźuńa.
T́ek Teńri julur ǯanymny er- kińd́ań ǵorńuń ki alyr ḿeni hamḿeš́a.
Qorḥmaɣyn ki ḥoǯalansa kiši ki artsa maly juv́uńuń.
Ki öĺǵanińd́a almastyr ńeḿed́a eńḿaśtir artyndan maly anyn.
Ki ǯany tiri eǵanińd́a alɣyšlanyr da maḥtarlar śeni ki jaḥšy et́sej öźuja.

Kelir doruna dejiń atalarynyn
öḿurǵa dejiń ḱorḿaśĺar jaryḥny.
Adam abajly ǯany bolsa da anla- masa Torany ušejdyr tuvarlar kibik ki tesiĺadirĺar.

app.note: Probably a misspelling and hypercorrection of tabušturmaḥ ʻriddleʼ (KRPS 503).
